statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(basename "$current_dir"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.fileMode=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ""); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); printf 'ğŸ“ \033[36m%s\033[0m' "$project"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf ' ğŸŒ¿ \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$branch"; printf ' ğŸ¤– \033[33m%s\033[0m' "$model"; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf ' ğŸ“Š \033[35m%d%%\033[0m' "$pct"; fi
